---
title: 'js汉字转拼音首字母' 
date: 2018-12-07 2:30:09
hidden: true
slug: 0prdswkzq9to
categories: [reprint]
---

{{< raw >}}

                    
<h3 id="articleHeader0">一、实现功能</h3>
<p>汉字转拼音首字母</p>
<h3 id="articleHeader1">二、业务场景</h3>
<p>在写即时通讯时必然要做通讯录（联系人列表），联系人列表通常是按照拼音字母表的顺序进行展示的，所以我们要识别文字的拼音首字母。</p>
<h3 id="articleHeader2">三、效果如图</h3>
<p><span class="img-wrap"><img data-src="/img/bV7FCA?w=386&amp;h=587" src="https://static.alili.tech/img/bV7FCA?w=386&amp;h=587" alt="clipboard.png" title="clipboard.png" style="cursor: pointer; display: inline;"></span></p>
<h3 id="articleHeader3">四、实现思路</h3>
<p>把这些名字的的汉字首字母提取出来，并且把相同字母的汉字归类，最后显示成列表。方法是用unicode去实现，把汉字转换成unicode，通过已经封装的unicode字母分类去获取汉字的首字母。当然必不可少的也需要验证是否为汉字，假如是汉字就要去分类，非汉字就可以直接返回了；还需要去除空格等等小细节。</p>
<h3 id="articleHeader4">五、代码</h3>
<div class="widget-codetool" style="display:none;">
      <div class="widget-codetool--inner">
      <span class="selectCode code-tool" data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="" data-original-title="全选"></span>
      <span type="button" class="copyCode code-tool" data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" data-clipboard-text="<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

    <script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;>

    //函数使用,本表收录的字符的Unicode编码范围为19968至40869, XDesigner 整理

&quot;38466&quot;: &quot;PB&quot;, &quot;38477&quot;: &quot;XJ&quot;, &quot;38518&quot;: &quot;YT&quot;, &quot;38551&quot;: &quot;WK&quot;, &quot;38585&quot;: &quot;ZC&quot;, &quot;38704&quot;: &quot;XS&quot;, &quot;38739&quot;: &quot;LJ&quot;, &quot;38761&quot;: &quot;GJ&quot;, &quot;38808&quot;: &quot;SQ&quot;, &quot;39048&quot;: &quot;JG&quot;, &quot;39049&quot;: &quot;XJ&quot;, &quot;39052&quot;: &quot;HG&quot;, &quot;39076&quot;: &quot;CZ&quot;, &quot;39271&quot;: &quot;XT&quot;, &quot;39534&quot;: &quot;TD&quot;, &quot;39552&quot;: &quot;TD&quot;, &quot;39584&quot;: &quot;PB&quot;, &quot;39647&quot;: &quot;SB&quot;, &quot;39730&quot;: &quot;LG&quot;, &quot;39748&quot;: &quot;TPB&quot;, &quot;40109&quot;: &quot;ZQ&quot;, &quot;40479&quot;: &quot;ND&quot;, &quot;40516&quot;: &quot;HG&quot;, &quot;40536&quot;: &quot;HG&quot;, &quot;40583&quot;: &quot;QJ&quot;, &quot;40765&quot;: &quot;YQ&quot;, &quot;40784&quot;: &quot;QJ&quot;, &quot;40840&quot;: &quot;YK&quot;, &quot;40863&quot;: &quot;QJG&quot; };
    //转字符串数组程序  
    function makePy(str) {
        if (typeof(str) != &quot;string&quot;)
            throw new Error(-1, &quot;函数makePy需要字符串类型参数!&quot;);
        var arrResult = new Array();
        //将字符串转码后转为数组  
        for (var i = 0, len = str.length; i < len; i++) {
            var ch = str.charAt(i);
            arrResult.push(checkCh(ch));
        }
        return mkRslt(arrResult);
    }
    //测试程序  
    function get() {
        var str = document.getElementById(&quot;text&quot;).value;
        alert(makePy(str));
    }

    function checkCh(ch) {
        var uni = ch.charCodeAt(0);
        //如果不在汉字处理范围之内,返回原字符,也可以调用自己的处理函数    
        if (uni > 40869 || uni < 19968)
            return ch; //dealWithOthers(ch);    
        //检查是否是多音字,是按多音字处理,不是就直接在strChineseFirstPY字符串中找对应的首字母    
        return (oMultiDiff[uni] ? oMultiDiff[uni] : (strChineseFirstPY.charAt(uni - 19968)));
    }

    function mkRslt(arr) {
        var arrRslt = [&quot;&quot;];
        for (var i = 0, len = arr.length; i < len; i++) {
            var str = arr[i];
            var strlen = str.length;
            if (strlen == 1) {
                for (var k = 0; k < arrRslt.length; k++) {
                    arrRslt[k] += str;
                }
            } else {
                var tmpArr = arrRslt.slice(0);
                arrRslt = [];
                for (k = 0; k < strlen; k++) {
                    //复制一个相同的arrRslt    
                    var tmp = tmpArr.slice(0);
                    //把当前字符str[k]添加到每个元素末尾    
                    for (var j = 0; j < tmp.length; j++) {
                        tmp[j] += str.charAt(k);
                    }
                    //把复制并修改后的数组连接到arrRslt上    
                    arrRslt = arrRslt.concat(tmp);
                }
            }
        }
        return arrRslt;
    }
    </script>
</head>

    <input type=&quot;text&quot; id=&quot;text&quot;>

    //函数使用,本表收录的字符的Unicode编码范围为19968至40869, XDesigner 整理
    var strChineseFirstPY = "";
    //此处收录了375个多音字
    var oMultiDiff = { "19969": "DZ", "19975": "WM", "19988": "QJ", "20048": "YL", "20056": "SC", "20060": "NM", "20094": "QG", "20127": "QJ", "20167": "QC", "20193": "YG", "20250": "KH", "20256": "38585": "ZC", "38704": "XS", "38739": "LJ", "38761": "GJ", "38808": "SQ", "39048": "JG", "39049": "XJ", "39052": "HG", "39076": "CZ", "39271": "XT", "39534": "TD", "39552": "TD", "39584": "PB", "39647": "SB", "39730": "LG", "39748": "TPB", "40109": "ZQ", "40479": "ND", "40516": "HG", "40536": "HG", "40583": "QJ", "40765": "YQ", "40784": "QJ", "40840": "YK", "40863": "QJG" };
    //转字符串数组程序  
    function makePy(str) {
        if (typeof(str) != "string")
            throw new Error(-1, "函数makePy需要字符串类型参数!");
        var arrResult = new Array();
        //将字符串转码后转为数组  
        for (var i = 0, len = str.length; i &lt; len; i++) {
            var ch = str.charAt(i);
            arrResult.push(checkCh(ch));
        }
        return mkRslt(arrResult);
    }
    //测试程序  
    function get() {
        var str = document.getElementById("text").value;
        alert(makePy(str));
    }

    function checkCh(ch) {
        var uni = ch.charCodeAt(0);
        //如果不在汉字处理范围之内,返回原字符,也可以调用自己的处理函数    
        if (uni &gt; 40869 || uni &lt; 19968)
            return ch; //dealWithOthers(ch);    
        //检查是否是多音字,是按多音字处理,不是就直接在strChineseFirstPY字符串中找对应的首字母    
        return (oMultiDiff[uni] ? oMultiDiff[uni] : (strChineseFirstPY.charAt(uni - 19968)));
    }

    function mkRslt(arr) {
        var arrRslt = [""];
        for (var i = 0, len = arr.length; i &lt; len; i++) {
            var str = arr[i];
            var strlen = str.length;
            if (strlen == 1) {
                for (var k = 0; k &lt; arrRslt.length; k++) {
                    arrRslt[k] += str;
                }
            } else {
                var tmpArr = arrRslt.slice(0);
                arrRslt = [];
                for (k = 0; k &lt; strlen; k++) {
                    //复制一个相同的arrRslt    
                    var tmp = tmpArr.slice(0);
                    //把当前字符str[k]添加到每个元素末尾    
                    for (var j = 0; j &lt; tmp.length; j++) {
                        tmp[j] += str.charAt(k);
                    }
                    //把复制并修改后的数组连接到arrRslt上    
                    arrRslt = arrRslt.concat(tmp);
                }
            }
        }
        return arrRslt;
    }
    &lt;/script&gt;
&lt;/head&gt;

&lt;body&gt;
    &lt;input type="text" id="text"&gt;
    &lt;input type="button" onclick="javascript:get()" value="查看拼音"&gt;
&lt;/body&gt;
